item.title: Working with upgrade virtual guest dedicated and families
item.description: Upgrade CPU, RAM for VSI dedicated. To get the items KeyNames available to upgrade your VSI, you can use the service SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest::getUpgradeItemPrices. Add to your request a mask as the below to retrieve the items KeyNames. mask[id,item[id,keyName,description] I suggest you to search the items comparing with the control portal, use the description and search in the response, then use the keyName of that item. Change the “items” variable with the cpu and ram keyNames you want to upgrade your vs.
